column4: Hi, im very new to this ubuntu stuff. i have a question. When i click on "Computer" it only has Filesystem and CD-RW/DVD. Where can i find my harddrive???
can i make a nother hard drive then? cuase there is so0o0 many other files in there.
i guess you could re-partition it, but that would be kinda pointless, just put files you want easy access to, in your home folder.
